oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Widow's pension application documents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sarah Pearce of Watauga [Valley], Tenn. is applying for Union pension based on the service of her deceased husband Samuel D. Pearce, Co. H, 4th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA. These Department of interior, Bureau of Pension letters and circulars refer to the widowed Mrs. Pearce's claim, her re-marriage and children.
